channel.title: Nicolle on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – February 5, 2020
item.description: Rained all last night and day, sloppy muddy out. Took kids to bus for school. One of the first into work and didn’t leave until the very last minute. Just barely got the kids! Probably close to breaking even on time, I’ll figure it up tomorrow. Ashley brought home a paper about her hero – it was me! I needed a shirt and tie for the dance this Friday, so I tried to take Dwyane and Bruce with me.

item.title: Status Update – September 5, 2019
item.description: Normal AM. Worked a long day again. Kids got their school photos. Bruce looks so stinking cute except for his face is all mangled from scrapes and cuts. Dwyane’s tooth is crooked and in front of the others giving his this weird kind of smile. Ashley looks exactly like Nicolle, Lesa doesn’t think so much. Dillan looks good and with a decent smile for once. At dinner all the kids tattled on everyone else’s girlfriend/boyfriends – none of them really have one – just teasing each other.
